scripts.build: cross-env CI=true run-p type-check && vite build
scripts.build:rc: cross-env CI=true run-p type-check && vite build --mode rc
scripts.build:qa: cross-env CI=true run-p type-check && vite build --mode qa
scripts.build:prod: cross-env CI=true run-p type-check && vite build --mode production
